localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: https://instantcard.co.uk/ generates images from articles perfect for sharing on Instagram. Simply enter the URL of the website you'd like to share and InstantCard will create an image which you can tweak to your satisfaction, download, and then post!
blogPost.body: https://instantcard.co.uk/ generates images from articles perfect for sharing on Instagram. Simply enter the URL of the website you'd like to share and InstantCard will create an image which you can tweak to your satisfaction, download, and then post!
blogPost.title: InstantCard - Turn your articles into Instagram images
blogPost.author: James Calmus

localize.description: https://instantcard.co.uk/、記事からInstagramでの共有に最適な画像を生成します。シェアしたいウェブサイトのURLを入力するだけで、InstantCardが画像を作成してくれるので、自分の好みに合わせて調整し、ダウンロードして投稿することができます。
https://instantcard.co.uk/，从文章中生成图片，非常适合在Instagram上分享。只需输入你想分享的网站的URL，InstantCard就会创建一个图片，你可以调整到你满意的程度，下载，然后发布
https://instantcard.co.uk/，從文章中生成圖片，非常適合在Instagram上分享。只需輸入你想分享的網站的URL，InstantCard就會創建一個圖片，你可以調整到你滿意的程度，下載，然後發佈

previous.title:
The CAPE ratio has been above its long-term average for 97% of the time since 1990. 

https://t.co/KlKNbAShGv https://t.co/wIBbeD5dzK

localize.full_text:
CAPEレシオは、1990年以降、97％の期間で長期平均値を上回っています。

https://t.co/KlKNbAShGv https://t.co/wIBbeD5dzK

自1990年以来，CAPE比率有97%的时间高于其长期平均值。

https://t.co/KlKNbAShGv https://t.co/wIBbeD5dzK

自1990年以來，CAPE比率有97%的時間高於其長期平均值。
